1.「……水温よし。| しびれくらげの姿も……見えないな。: ...water temperature good. No Man o' War in|sight....

2.「ムーロンさん。問題なさそうっス！: Mr. Muron. Looks like we're good to go!

3.「まどろっこしいのは ナシだぜ。| スリルとロマンスの夏は 唐突に始まる……。: No need to be a slacker. The summer of thrills|and romance begins abruptly...

5.「この夏 最大の青春が| 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！: The greatest youth of this summer is waiting|for you with its big mouth open!

6.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！| お待ちかね 海開きの時間だぞぉっ！: Yo, guys!　Hey you guys! You've been waiting|for me. It's time to open the sea!

12.「このワタシが来たからには ノープロブレム…… | サメだろうが アメだろうが: I'm here now, so it's no problem... sharks or|turtles, I'm ready to rock and roll! I'll get|you, I'll get you!

13.「わあっ！| サメバーンを 帰らせるための| 秘密兵器が できたんですねっ！: Wow! We have a secret weapon to bring|Sharkburn home!

14.「おうともよ！| サイッコーのブツが できちまった。| さっそく ドハデなファイ: Oh, yeah! I've got the perfect thing for you.|Let's fire off some serious fire right now!

16.「これで サメバーンを 追い払えるのかって？| ……大丈夫。この花火が 終わるこ: You're asking me if this is going to get rid|of Sharkburn? Don't worry. It will be gone by|the time the fireworks are over.

17.「昔むかし とある深海に | サメバーンのお姫様が いました。: Once upon a time, there was a Sharkburn|princess in the deep sea.

19.「おだやかだけど 退屈な深海で 生まれ育った | サメバーンのお姫様。ある時 人:
The princess of Sharkburn was born and raised|in the calm but boring depths of the ocean.|One day, a mermaid friend tells her about life|
|on earth.

20.「地上の人々は 夏になると 海に出て | いろいろな 楽しいことをして| 夏を: People on earth go to the sea in the summer|and enjoy summer by doing various fun things.

21.「わたしも 地上の夏を 楽しみたい！| ……そう思った お姫様は| 海に住む魔女: I want to enjoy summer on earth, too! ...so|the princess visited the witch who lived in|the sea.

22.「魔女は 人間に変身できる薬を くれました。| ただし それは飲んだ者が 願いを:
The witch gave her a potion that could|transform her into a human. However, it was a|potion that would only allow the drinker to|
|return to his or her original form if he or|she made a wish.

23.「人間に変身した お姫様は 願いどおり| ビーチで 夏を満喫しようとしました。|: The princess, transformed into a human, wanted|to enjoy the summer on the beach as she|wished. But...

24.「みんなには内緒で こっそり 出かけたせいで| 臣下のサメバーンたちが 姫を探し:
Because she had sneaked out without telling|anyone, her subjects, the Sharkburn|Princesses, had come to the beach in search of|
|her.

25.「事情を説明しようにも 人間の姿では| サメバーンの仲間たちと 言葉が 通じませ:
The princess is at a loss to explain the|situation, but in her human form she is unable|to communicate with her Sharkburn companions.|
|The princess is at a loss.

26.「そんな時 お姫様は とても親切な旅人と | 出会いました。旅人は ５色の真珠を: Then the princess met a very kind traveler.|The traveler collected five colored pearls and|showed the princess the fireworks.

27.「生まれてはじめて見た 花火は | うっとりするほど キレイで……| お姫様は: The princess enjoyed the summer to the fullest|thanks to the travelers.

28.「……<pc>みたいな 人がいるなら| このまま 人間として暮らすのも| いいか: ...I thought that if there is a person like|<pc>, I might as well continue to|live as a human...

29.「遠い 遠い 深海から| わざわざ 探しにきてくれた みんなを| 置いていけない: I can't leave everyone who came all the way|from the deep sea, far, far away, to look for|me. So...

30.「……サメバーンたちが 引き上げていくぞ！: ...Sharkburn and the others are pulling up!

31.<center>夢のような時間を ありがとう……。: Thank you for a dreamy time...

32.「……水温よし。| サメバーンの姿も……見えないな。: ...water temperature good. No sign of|Sharkburn either...not that I can see.

33.「ムーロンさん。| どうやら 問題なさそうっス！: Mr. Muron. Looks like we're in the clear!

34.「ちょっとしたアクシデントは あったが…… | 夏のロマンスに 障害はつきものっ: There were a few hiccups, but hey, summer|romances are bound to have hiccups.

36.「この夏 最大の青春が| 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！: The greatest youth of this summer is waiting|for you with its big mouth open!

37.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！| 待たせて 悪かったな！| 今度こそ 海開きの時間だ: Yo, guys!　Hey, guys! Sorry for keeping you|waiting! Now it's time to open the sea!

38.「こうして 願いをかなえ サメバーンの姿に| 戻ることができた お姫様は 仲間た:
The princess was granted her wish and returned|to her Sharkburn form, and she and her|companions returned to the deep sea. And so,|
|the princess and her companions returned to|the deep sea.
